text: What is the primary business goal of this conversational banking chatbot? (e.g., customer service, Policiec and procedures, upselling, account servicing, lead generation)
Which banking products and services should the chatbot support in the POC? (Retail, corporate, wealth, cards, loans, etc.)
What KPIs will define success for this POC? (e.g., CSAT, containment rate, cost savings, revenue uplift)
Who is the target audience? (Existing customers, prospects, high-net-worth clients, SMEs, etc.)
How will the chatbot fit into the current customer journey and omni-channel strategy?
Which top customer intents or journeys do you want to prioritize in the POC? (e.g., balance inquiry, fund transfers, loan eligibility)
Do we expect transactional capabilities (e.g., fund transfer, bill pay) in the POC or will it be informational only?
What languages and dialects should the chatbot support initially?
What are the compliance boundaries? (e.g., MAS, GDPR, PCI DSS for financial data)
What integration points are required in the POC? (Core banking system, CRM, KYC, payment gateways)
Is the chatbot expected to be voice-enabled or text-only for the POC?
Which channels should the chatbot run on first? (Mobile app, web, WhatsApp, SMS, phone IVR)
What is the preferred AI/NLP stack or do we have flexibility? (e.g., Azure AI, AWS Lex, Google Dialogflow, OpenAI)
Are there existing APIs or middleware for banking transactions, or will we need to develop new ones?
What authentication method will the chatbot use for secure interactions? (OTP, biometrics, SSO, device binding)
What is the escalation process when the chatbot cannot resolve an issue? (Seamless handoff to human agents, live chat, callback)
Who will own the chatbot’s knowledge base and content updates after POC? (In-house team, vendor, hybrid)
What is the plan for monitoring and improving intent accuracy and conversation quality during and after POC?
What bias, ethics, and fairness checks will we implement for AI responses in banking contexts?
What is the desired go-live timeline and how does it align with other ongoing digital banking projects?
Do you want me to prepare that checklist next?
also add another 10 questions what is the infrastructure they have currently? Like H100GPU?
What is the current hosting environment for banking applications? (On-premises data center, private cloud, public cloud — AWS/Azure/GCP, hybrid)
Do you have access to high-performance compute for AI workloads? (e.g., NVIDIA H100/A100 GPUs, TPUs, high-memory CPU clusters)
Is there an existing enterprise AI platform or ML Ops framework in place? (e.g., Databricks, Azure ML, SageMaker, Vertex AI)
What NLP/NLU engines or LLMs are already licensed or approved for banking use?
Are there approved AI security controls in place for GenAI/LLM use in regulated environments?
Do you have an API management layer for securely exposing banking services to the chatbot? (e.g., Apigee, Kong, Mulesoft)
What is the network latency tolerance for real-time conversational flows across your customer channels?
Are there existing monitoring and observability tools for AI and chatbot workloads? (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog, Elastic)
